front.title: An Overview of the IETF Network Management Standards

abstract.t: This document gives an overview of the IETF network managementstandards and summarizes existing and ongoing development of IETFstandards-track network management protocols and data models. Thepurpose of this document is on the one hand to help system developersand users to select appropriate standard management protocols anddata models to address relevant management needs. On the other handthe document can be used as an overview and guideline by other SDOsor bodies planning to use IETF management technologies and datamodels.
